title: The Dragon's Altar3

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: ...! Isn't that my sister and the others!? Who are they protecting...? Damn... That's... Is that Medeus...?

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Wait, if the princesses are in the way, your highness' sword will be unable to strike. We must think of something fast, otherwise the Earth Dragons will awaken, and then they will be in even more pain.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: What should I do...? How can I save them? Please tell me Jagen.

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: That... Not even I know. To defeat Medeus there is probably no other way except to...

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: ...! What, you want me to kill them!?

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: That is one way. The princess cannot suffer any more. Taking their life is also a way of saving them.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Jagen, are you SERIOUSLY telling me to make this decision?

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: As leader, there are times when you must make painful decisions. That is what I meant.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Jagen, that's enough, I understand. I will not give up. There must be some other way. Until the very end, I will not give up!!

battle.speaker: Cleric
battle.line: THOSE WHO OPPOSE... LORD MEDEUS... MUST DIE...

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Maria! Please open your eyes. It's me, Minerva! Be strong!

recruit-talk.speaker: Maria
recruit-talk.line: Uh... Oh... Minerva, sister... Ahh, Medeus, he...

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Everything's alright now, relax. I'm sorry, Maria, for letting you experience all this...

recruit-talk.speaker: Maria
recruit-talk.line: Sister... I'm scared... so scared. Oh! How is brother? He fought with Gharnef to rescue me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Michalis, he... He's alright, Maria, don't worry.

recruit-talk.speaker: Maria
recruit-talk.line: Really? Then, when we return home, will we be like one big family again? That's great, sister. Oh, I really want to see brother again.

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Maria...

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: Princess Nyna! Open your eyes! Be strong...!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Ah... I made a huge mistake. Because of my stupidity... I caused such grief for Hardin. And I made him... turn into that. Oh... I... What should I do?

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: Empress... Prince Marth has already ended Hardin's suffering. Even until the end Hardin still loved you, and he apologized for his crimes. It's alright now. You don't need to suffer anymore. You just had a bad dream, that's all...

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: Princess Nyna! You mustn't give up. You shouldn't be a weak person!

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Ah...! You are... Camus...!? You are Camus!! Why... Why are you... Am I dreaming? You're still alive... Ah... It's true...

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: .....! Empress... I think you're mistaken. I am Sirius, a soldier of the allied army. I don't know anybody called Camus...

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Sirius...!? ...How...? No! That's wrong!! You must be...

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: Please calm down. You must be very tired. I must leave this place very soon. Well, Empress Nyna... You should return to Prince Marth's side...

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: You... Where are you going?

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: I must return to my country. I... I have somebody waiting there for me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Really, is that so? I understand... Sirius... thank you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: It's... nothing... Empress, you must go!

recruit-talk.speaker: Merric
recruit-talk.line: Elice! It's me, Merric! Please open your eyes. I studied magic so that I could protect you... Yet I still couldn't do that, or be by your side... Elice... I'm begging you... Please open your eyes!

recruit-talk.speaker: Elice
recruit-talk.line: Merric...? ...! Oh, Merric! Save me... Gharnef, he... is so frightening... Please save me!

recruit-talk.speaker: Merric
recruit-talk.line: Elice! Great, you've finally awakened. It's alright now, I'm here. Oh... But Marth... and the others are watching... This is embarrassing. Elice, no matter what happens I won't leave your side again... Okay?

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: Miss Lena, wake up! It's me, Julian. What should I do? I know I'm a man with no merits, but for you I will do anything. I don't have any other wishes, I just want to see you smile, Miss Lena. Smile, I'm begging you, Miss Lena...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: Oh... Julian... You did come. I believed that you would definitely come. So that's how I could endure the horrors that I faced... Julian, I'm sorry. I always acted like a spoiled brat to you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: No... Just hearing Miss Lena's words is enough for me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: Julian, can you listen to a request of mine?

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: Huh? Oh, please ask, as long as I can do it...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: From now on, just call me Lena. It seems so impersonal when you call me Miss Lena. Because we're going to return to Macedon, to live together.

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: Huh? ...Miss Lena... Oh... No... I meant Le... na... Do you really mean that...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: Mmm... I believe the deities will forgive me. Because of my... love for you.

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: I... HAVE RESURRECTED... STUPID HUMANS... I WILL KILL YOU ALL...

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: HAHAHA... IT'S NOT OVER YET. YOUR NAIVETY... WILL DESTROY YOU... THOSE SISTERS WILL BE SACRIFICED... THEY WILL BECOME MY BLOOD AND MY FLESH... AND GIVE ME POWER!

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: GWA...! WHY... WHY HAVE I... BEEN DEFEATED... SO EASILY...... IS THIS... THE POWER... OF NAGA'S... BINDING SHIELD...? BUT... HUMANS. DON'T FORGET... AS LONG AS GREED LIVES ON IN YOUR HEARTS... YOU WILL LOSE THE SHIELD AND I WILL RISE FROM THE EARTH ONCE AGAIN... REMEMBER... TH...IS...

end.speaker: Gotoh
end.line: Marth, courageous prince of Altea. Because of your efforts, the Dark Earth Dragon, Medeus, has finally been completely destroyed. Medeus's servants, the Earth Dragons have also vanished into the darkness. As long as the Binding Shield exists, they won't awaken anymore. Marth, descendant of Anri, and the chosen Prince of Light. You have saved mankind, and you have saved our dragon tribe...

end.speaker: Tiki
end.line: Marth!! I don't have to go back to the Ice Dragons' Temple anymore. I'm so happy! I really like everybody. I definitely don't want to live all by myself at that lonely place again. It's really... like a dream. I'm so happy, so very happy. Marth, I really like you!!

end.speaker: Marisha
end.line: Really Tiki... For how long do you plan on hogging Marth!? Honestly Marth, if you dare to show even the slightest happiness, Caeda won't forgive you.

end.speaker: Caeda
end.line: Marisha, you're talking nonsense again. However Marth really does look happy...

end.speaker: Marisha
end.line: He can finally put to rest his heavy burden. Lord Marth has always been carrying such a heavy responsibility. It must have been hard on him. But Caeda has also had it hard. There are so many people around Marth that finding a chance to even talk to him is difficult. You must have been lonely.

end.speaker: Caeda
end.line: Mmm... It doesn't matter. As long as Marth is safe, I wouldn't wish for anything else. I once prayed to the deities, since Marth had such an important mission. I prayed that if they decided his life was to be taken, to take my life in his place... That was all I could do.

end.speaker: Marisha
end.line: ..... Ah, Caeda truly can't be beaten. But you don't have to wait any longer. Because Lord Marth is about to return to your side. Look, Caeda, Marth is looking over there. Use your courage!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Caeda, it's finally over. I'm sorry for making you suffer.

end.speaker: Caeda
end.line: No, I couldn't help you one bit... I'm the one that should be sorry.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Don't be silly. It's only because I had Caeda that I was able to reach this day. Things will be more difficult from now onwards. The seven kingdoms of Archanea are going to be unified, and everybody is going to hand responsibility to me. But, such a task I cannot possibly do by myself. Caeda, I hope you can help me. I really need you.

end.speaker: Caeda
end.line: I... When I left Talys island, I already swore an oath. No matter where you went, I would be by your side. No matter what happened I would have faith in you. So, no matter what hardships there are, I can endure them. Because Marth... I lov...

narration: And so the tragic War of Heroes finally came to an end. The seven kingdoms were unified by Prince Marth. The united Kingdom of Archanea was established and peace reigned. The tales of the heroes were remembered by future generations. Archanea’s hero saga… This is the story of the brave warriors who saved Archanea…
